I studied for 5602 days, with vacation breaks of roughly 4 to 5 months per year.
I wrote, drew, painted, cried, laughed, slept, did not sleep, did all my subjects in school, did not sleep again, missed classes, arrived early, arrived late, filmed, cooked, ate, dated, worked and finnaly graduated.
My favorite part was eating.

Now I'm trying to do all of this, but making some money at the same time. Explore and check some of my work
